products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This soft Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink vertical blind brings warm-toned splash of rose pink to your room.  This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office!Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This gorgeous pink vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1281 Fabric Colour: Rosewood Pink Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Blush Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Blush Pink 89mm Vertical Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! Loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This blush pink vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.This vertical blind with accompanying white components and gorgeous pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our vertical blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart or the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.

products.title: Bella Bossa (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Bella Bossa (Blackout) Blackout Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
